relation: Great for these types of students
McKendree is great for students that want to get away from the daily hustle of life. McKendree has a very laid back and friendly atmosphere. The students are mainly athletes so athletes are welcomed.
Hanging out with friends is something most people do. You can also participate in sports or go workout on your own or bring your friends along. There are also malls near by where you can hang out.
The food is the best!!! The food is always fresh and on point. The cafeteria is clean and neat and can handle the lunch rush.
McKendree built new dorms. The dorms are amazing and i get to live in the new dorms. Eveyone inside the dorms are amazing too.
The academics are not easy. I strive to go for the hardest subjects and I try to be the best. I love every minute of my school year.
Just make sure you are absolutely ready to be on your own. Make sure you have everything you need when you first arrive. Lastly, make lots of friends because school will be a lot easier of you do.

McKendree University is an amazing school with a family atmosphere on campus. All the professors and the coaches are there to help us succeed in life and they make sure we know they are there to help. On a scale of 1-10 I rate McKendree University a 10.
pageTitle: McKendree University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

Login to rate or flag the reviews Matt from Belleville, IL 05/20/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 25 Categories Comments Great for these types of students McKendree encourages dedication to studies, but the school is a great place for any individual, with many activities such as movie nights and live entertainment. Tips for prospective students If you get 30 or above on the ACT, you will have better chances at getting a larger scholarship. Make sure you contact the school about it the fall or early spring before your planned first year so you don't miss the scholarship events.
